hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah said:"Do not urge someone to cancel a sale he has already agreed upon so as to sell him your own goods, unless he bys or changes his mind

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ الرَّجُلِ عَلَى بَيْعِ أَخِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Urging Someone to Cancel A Sale He Has already Agreed Upon So As To Sell Him Your Own Goods
